saveGame(GameStatus) - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method creates a new file representing the current game status.
saveScores() - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method creates a new file call highscores.bombSave.
setActive(boolean) - Method in class system.Player
This method sets the player condition depending on the isActive method.
setBlastRadius(int) - Method in class system.Player
This method sets the blast radius of the player.
setBossBomb(boolean) - Method in class system.Bomb
This method checks if the bomb is a boss bomb or a player bomb
setBossExplosion(boolean) - Method in class system.Explosion
This method sets the explosion to a boss explosion
setCoordinates(int, int) - Method in class system.MapObject
Sets the co-ordinates of the object.
setDead(boolean) - Method in class system.MapObject
Sets the object's state according to the isDead method.
setDifficulty(Difficulty) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method sets the difficulty
setGameOver(boolean) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method sets whether the game is over or not
setImage(Image) - Method in class system.MapObject
Sets the image of the object.
setInvulnerable(boolean) - Method in class system.Player
This method sets whether the player is invulnerable or not
setLevel(int) - Method in class system.Player
This method sets the level of the player.
setLives(int) - Method in class system.Player
This method sets the number of lives the player has.
setMaxBombs(int) - Method in class system.Player
This method sets the max number of bombs the player has.
setMenuBars(JFrame) - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method sets up the menu bars of the bomberman game.
setName(String) - Method in class system.Player
 
setOnePlayer(boolean) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method sets the game mode to single player
setScore(int) - Method in class system.Player
This method takes as input an integer and sets the score of the player as the input.
setScores(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class system.GameStatus
Thie method sets the scores
setType(Powerup.PowerupType) - Method in class system.Powerup
This method sets the type of the power up.

Sets the x position of the object.
setyPos(int) - Method in class system.MapObject
Sets the y position of the object.
SoftBlock - Class in system
The class SoftBlock reprents the soft block object in the bomberman game.
SoftBlock(int, int) - Constructor for class system.SoftBlock
This method takes as input the location of the softblock and loads the softblock image at the location.
Sound - Class in system
The class Sound represents the sounds of the Bomberman Game.
Sound() - Constructor for class system.Sound
 
SpaceAction - Class in actions
The SpaceAction class represents the code that is triggered when the space key is pressed.
SpaceAction(GameStatus) - Constructor for class actions.SpaceAction
This method initializes a game status class to be used by the other function.
startGame() - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method calls one of two possible methdos in GameEngine depending on if the game is one player or two player.
startOnePlayerGame() - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method starts a one player game by adding a new player at the starting location and starting the physics and graphics thread.
startThreads() - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method starts the physics and graphics thread
startTwoPlayerGame() - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method starts a two player game by adding two players at the starting location and setting one of them to inActive.
switchActivePlayers() - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method switches the active and inactive players
